description: An ingot full of potential. Can be used to craft iron armor, weapons, and tools.
An ingot full of potential. Can be used to craft gold armor, weapons, and tools.
A shiny gem. Can be used to craft powerful diamond armor, weapons, and tools.
Shiny gems. Can be used to enchant armor, weapons, and tools. (mirror not included)
The only metal stronger than diamonds. Can be used to craft powerful netherite armor, weapons, and tools.
